title: Unfair RIOT
body:
My account has just been permanently banned by RIOT who state that I have been levelling up my account by botting. I bought this account 3 weeks ago (which I know a lot of people do, however it was unranked when I bought it and I have since reached plat 5). So it must be that the account was levelled up by someone using automated bots for the purpose of selling it which I was unaware of.
However they are banning my account now thus the only person being punished is me. I find this completely unfair. As the game is now it is too time consuming and boring levelling up an account and gaining the blue essence to play ranked so I think it is ridiculous that RIOT expects each player who wants a new account to have to do this.

My main issue is that I am the only person being punished here however I have done nothing wrong. No one gains anything from banning my account so what is the point of it? All they are doing is upsetting me, who has put a lot of time and effort into this game and thoroughly enjoy it. 

Why wont RIOT help me? Once again they are not assisting any of their stakeholders.

This is a dumb post bro, people who played in games with that account you just bought have inted every single game and causing multiple-probably hundreds of people a bad experience in a game, so why the fuck would anyone care about an account that you bought knowing that there is always a chance of it being suspended. 

Everyone know sbuying accounts can be banned which is why you buy the more expensive ones because they were probably levelled with better scripts.

1. You *bought* the account, which is a *blatant* breach of the ToU and EULA (and also *technically* illegal). Regardless of how the account was levelled up, it would have still been banned.
2. I can guarantee that *at least* 99.99% of accounts for sale were levelled using bot programs. There's no excuse for not knowing that.
3. There is literally no reason for Riot to give players the option of creating an account at any given level other than level 1. The only reason you want that is so you can continue to break the rules without any significant consequence, otherwise why would you even need/want an additional account considering the addition of uncapped levelling? (and before you say anything about being "stuck in elo hell", that's complete BS. You'd only be stuck in a given ELO because you're not significantly better than the people in that elo)
4. I can guarantee that *at least* 99% of accounts that are botted and/or transfer "ownership" get banned. You are *not* the only player who has been banned for this (not by a long shot), and you will not be the last (also not by a long shot).
5. Being a "stakeholder" (which I seriously doubt, by the way) and/or having payed money on the game doesn't entitle you to any preferential treatment. Get over yourself.
